(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (CD One))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS friends))))
    (VP (VBD alerted))))


nsubj(alerted-5, One-1)
prep(One-1, of-2)
poss(friends-4, my-3)
pobj(of-2, friends-4)
root(ROOT-0, alerted-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (PRP me))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN fact))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT that))
            (S
              (VP (VBP ieatishootipost)))))))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBN featured)
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ current) (NN issue))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (JJ i) (JJ weekly) (NN magazine))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubjpass(featured-9, me-1)
prep(me-1, to-2)
det(fact-4, the-3)
pobj(to-2, fact-4)
nsubj(ieatishootipost-6, that-5)
rcmod(fact-4, ieatishootipost-6)
aux(featured-9, has-7)
auxpass(featured-9, been-8)
root(ROOT-0, featured-9)
prep(featured-9, in-10)
det(issue-13, the-11)
amod(issue-13, current-12)
pobj(in-10, issue-13)
prep(issue-13, of-14)
amod(magazine-17, i-15)
amod(magazine-17, weekly-16)
pobj(of-14, magazine-17)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Unfortunately))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Unfortunately-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ my) (NN mandarin))
    (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
      (ADJP (JJ good) (RB enough)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB do)
              (NP
                (NP (DT an) (NN interpretation))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN text)))))))))
    (. .)))


poss(mandarin-2, my-1)
nsubj(good-5, mandarin-2)
cop(good-5, is-3)
neg(good-5, not-4)
root(ROOT-0, good-5)
advmod(good-5, enough-6)
aux(do-8, to-7)
xcomp(good-5, do-8)
det(interpretation-10, an-9)
dobj(do-8, interpretation-10)
prep(interpretation-10, of-11)
det(text-13, the-12)
pobj(of-11, text-13)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (ADVP (RB perhaps))
    (NP (NN someone))
    (VP (MD can)
      (VP (VB help)
        (VP (VB do)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN translation))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (PRP me)))))))
    (. ?)))


dep(help-5, So-1)
advmod(help-5, perhaps-2)
nsubj(help-5, someone-3)
aux(help-5, can-4)
root(ROOT-0, help-5)
xcomp(help-5, do-6)
det(translation-8, the-7)
dobj(do-6, translation-8)
prep(translation-8, for-9)
pobj(for-9, me-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Thanks)
      (ADVP (RB again))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (DT all) (NNS readers))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP (PRP$ your) (NN support))))))
    (. !)))


root(ROOT-0, Thanks-1)
advmod(Thanks-1, again-2)
prep(Thanks-1, to-3)
det(readers-5, all-4)
pobj(to-3, readers-5)
prep(readers-5, for-6)
poss(support-8, your-7)
pobj(for-6, support-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP OK))
    (ADVP (RB here))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN translation) (NN courtesy))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Vale) (NNP Ng)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(courtesy-6, OK-1)
advmod(courtesy-6, here-2)
cop(courtesy-6, 's-3)
det(courtesy-6, the-4)
nn(courtesy-6, translation-5)
root(ROOT-0, courtesy-6)
prep(courtesy-6, of-7)
nn(Ng-9, Vale-8)
pobj(of-7, Ng-9)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Also))
    (NP
      (NP (NNS thanks))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP Khim))
          (PP (IN for)
            (S
              (VP (VBG providing)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT another) (NN version))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NN translation))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (DT the) (NNS comments))))))))))))
    (. !)))


dep(thanks-2, Also-1)
root(ROOT-0, thanks-2)
prep(thanks-2, to-3)
pobj(to-3, Khim-4)
prep(Khim-4, for-5)
pcomp(for-5, providing-6)
det(version-8, another-7)
dobj(providing-6, version-8)
prep(version-8, of-9)
det(translation-11, the-10)
pobj(of-9, translation-11)
prep(translation-11, in-12)
det(comments-14, the-13)
pobj(in-12, comments-14)
